                    Customer PO No. : ${record.otherrefnum}
                    Payment Terms : ${record.terms}
                    
                    

                    Contact : ${record.custbody_sna_contact.entityid}
                    Branch : ${record.custbody_sna_branch}
                    
                    

                    Phone No. : ${record.custbody_sna_contact.phone}
                    Ship Method : ${record.shipmethod}
                    
                    

                     
                    Order Taken By : ${record.salesrep}
                    
                    

                     
                     
                    
                    

                    Equipment Object : ${record.custbody_sna_equipment_object.name}
                    Model : ${record.custbody_sna_equipment_object.custrecord_sna_equipment_model}
                    
                    

                    Make : ${record.custbody_sna_equipment_object.cseg_hul_mfg}
                    Serial Number : ${record.custbody_sna_equipment_object.custrecord_sna_serial_no}
                    
                

            
            
                
                    

                        Accepted By : .................................................................................
                         
                        
                            
                                PLEASE NOTE: 
                                Quoted Prices are subject to tariff surcharge based on 
                                existing federal requirement in force at the time of invoice.
                            
                        
                    
                    

                        Name : ............................................................................................
                         
                        Quote does not include order fees or freight cost.
                    
                    

                        Title : ...............................................................................................
                         
                        Quote is valid for 15 days and subject to an 8% variance.
                    
                    

                        Date : ..............................................................................................
                         
                         
                    
                    

                        Your PO No. : ..................................................................................
                         
                         
                    
                    

                        Signature : ___________________________________________X
                         
                         
                    
                
            
        
        
        
        
            
        
        
        	

        	${record.item[0].item@label}
        	Desc
        	Qty Ord
        	UOM
        	EA
        	Amount
        	
        
        <#list record.item as item>

        	${item.item}
        	${item.description}
        	${item.quantity}
        	${item.uom}
        	${item.rate}
        	${item.amount}
        	
        	</#list>

        

        	 
        	 
        	 
        	
        	

        	 
        	Total Material
        	${record.subtotal}
        	
        	

        	 
        	${record.subtotal@label}
        	${record.subtotal}
        	
        	

        	 
        	Total Sales Tax
        	${record.taxtotal}
        	
        	<#assign totalorder_ = record.subtotal + record.taxtotal>
        	

        	 
        	Total Order
        	${totalorder_?string.currency}
